00020 #ifndef INCLUDED_FRUCTOSE_PARSER
00021 #define INCLUDED_FRUCTOSE_PARSER

00023 #include <vector>
00024 #include <string>
00025 #include <fstream>
00026 #include <iostream>

00028 namespace fructose {
00029 
00030 class parsed_tests
00031 {
00032 public:
00033     virtual ~parsed_tests() = 0;
00034     virtual void add_file(const std::string& name) = 0;
00035     virtual void add_class(const std::string& name) = 0;
00036     virtual void add_test(const std::string& name) = 0;
00037 };
00038 
00039 void parse(const std::vector<std::string>& file_names,
00040            parsed_tests& test_collection);
00041 
00042 class file_parser
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     file_parser(const std::string& file_name,
00046                 parsed_tests& test_collection)
00047         : m_file_name(file_name)
00048         , m_test_collection(test_collection)
00049         , m_add_file(&file_parser::first_add_file) {}
00050 
00051     void operator()(const std::string& line);
00052 
00053     void add_class(const std::string& name);
00054     void add_test(const std::string& name);
00055 
00056 private:
00057     const std::string& m_file_name;
00058     parsed_tests& m_test_collection;
00059 
00060     typedef void (file_parser::*add_file)();
00061     add_file m_add_file;
00062 
00063     void first_add_file();
00064     void no_add_file();
00065 };
00066 
00067 class line_parser
00068 {
00069 public:
00070     line_parser(file_parser& parser,
00071                 const std::string& line);
00072 
00073 private:
00074     file_parser& m_parser;
00075     const std::string& m_line;
00076 
00077     typedef void (file_parser::*add_name)(const std::string&);
00078 
00079     void parse(const std::string& marker, add_name add);
00080 };
00081 
00082 void
00083 parse(std::istream& file, file_parser& parser);
00084 
00085 inline
00086 void 
00087 parse(const std::vector<std::string>& file_names,
00088       parsed_tests& test_collection)
00089 {
00090     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator file_name_i = file_names.begin(),
00091                                                   file_name_end = file_names.end();
00092          file_name_i != file_name_end;
00093          ++file_name_i)
00094     {
00095         std::ifstream file(file_name_i->c_str());
00096         if (file)
00097         {
00098             file_parser parser(*file_name_i, test_collection);
00099             parse(file, parser);
00100         }
00101         else
00102         {
00103             std::cerr << "Failed to open " << *file_name_i
00104                 << "; skipping the file" << std::endl;
00105         }
00106     }
00107 }
00108 
00109 inline
00110 void 
00111 file_parser::operator()(const std::string& line)
00112 {
00113     line_parser parser(*this, line);
00114 }
00115 
00116 inline
00117 void
00118 file_parser::add_class(const std::string& name)
00119 {
00120     (this->*m_add_file)();
00121     m_test_collection.add_class(name);
00122 }
00123 
00124 inline
00125 void
00126 file_parser::add_test(const std::string& name)
00127 {
00128     m_test_collection.add_test(name);
00129 }
00130 
00131 inline
00132 parsed_tests::~parsed_tests()
00133 {
00134 }
00135 
00136 inline
00137 void
00138 file_parser::first_add_file()
00139 {
00140     m_test_collection.add_file(m_file_name);
00141     m_add_file = &file_parser::no_add_file;
00142 }
00143 
00144 inline
00145 void
00146 file_parser::no_add_file()
00147 {
00148 }
00149 
00150 inline
00151 line_parser::line_parser(file_parser& parser,
00152                          const std::string& line)
00153     : m_parser(parser)
00154     , m_line(line) 
00155 {
00156     parse("FRUCTOSE_CLASS", &file_parser::add_class);
00157     parse("FRUCTOSE_STRUCT", &file_parser::add_class);
00158     parse("FRUCTOSE_TEST", &file_parser::add_test);
00159 }
00160 
00161 inline
00162 void 
00163 line_parser::parse(const std::string& marker, 
00164                    add_name add)
00165 {
00166     const std::string::size_type begin_marker =
00167         m_line.find(marker);
00168     if (begin_marker != std::string::npos)
00169     {
00170         const std::string::size_type open_parenthesis = 
00171             m_line.find("(", begin_marker + 1);
00172         if (open_parenthesis == std::string::npos)
00173         {
00174             std::cerr << "Skipping invalid " << marker << ": " << m_line
00175                 << std::endl;
00176             return;
00177         }
00178         const std::string::size_type close_parenthesis = 
00179             m_line.find(")", open_parenthesis + 1);
00180         if (close_parenthesis == std::string::npos)
00181         {
00182             std::cerr << "Skipping invalid " << marker << ": " << m_line
00183                 << std::endl;
00184             return;
00185         }
00186         std::string::size_type start_name = open_parenthesis + 1;
00187         while (isspace(m_line[start_name]))
00188         {
00189             ++start_name;
00190         }
00191         std::string::size_type end_name = close_parenthesis - 1;
00192         while (isspace(m_line[end_name]))
00193         {
00194             --end_name;
00195         }
00196         (m_parser.*add)(m_line.substr(start_name,
00197                                       end_name - start_name + 1));
00198     }
00199 }
00200 
00201 inline
00202 void
00203 parse(std::istream& file, file_parser& parser)
00204 {
00205     while (!file.eof())
00206     {
00207         std::string line;
00208         std::getline(file, line);
00209         parser(line);
00210     }
00211 }
00212 
00213 } // fructose namespace

00215 #endif
